articles.content: Kate Kruimink was looking for something to focus on. It was all very well to have a newborn daughter to look after, but what she needed was something to stop her "going up the wall". So she wrote a novel. "My daughter Edie was a poor sleeper, so I wrote with … [+1152 chars]
